text: Song Study EP is an extended play album released by American new wave band Devo on April 20, 2010. It features the same track listing and cover art as the 12" single of "Fresh," with the addition of the Song Study Video.https://www.amazon.com/dp/B003HI9DDC ==Track listing== #"Fresh" – 2:59 #"What We Do" – 3:17 #"Song Study Video" – 2:03 ==References== Category:Devo EPs Category:2010 EPs Category:Warner Records EPs
title: Song Study
